articles.description: Yesterday, we were an outlier; having a player harshly red carded by a VAR, then losing five goals away from home in Europe.  This morning, not so much.  Manchester United only lost the four goals when they went down to 10 men, but they were playing Copenhagen.  A truckload of compensatory sentiment accommodated Erik ten [...]

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers has urged for VAR to be abandoned criticizing the way it is used to referee matches.
Rodgers' comments follow Daizen Maeda's red card against Atletico Madrid on Tuesday, which left Celtic down to 10 men for the majority of the match.
The post Celtic boss makes bold comments on refereeing appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Celtic boss makes bold comments on refereeing

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Former Celtic striker John Hartson has defended Daizen Maeda after his sending off on Tuesday night against Atletico Madrid, even describing the sending off as harsh.
Hartson spoke of the negative effect the red card had on Tuesday's match, which meant that Atletico were able to take full advantage of gaps all over the pitch with Celtic down to 10 men Atletico scored five goals after Maeda's sending off.
The post John Hartson says a lot of things "conspired against Celtic" this week appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: John Hartson says a lot of things "conspired against Celtic" this week

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Former Celtic defender Mark Wilson has questioned Brendan Rodgers' tactics following Daizen Maeda's sending off against Atletico Madrid on Tuesday. 
Maeda was sent off in the 23rd minute, and Rodgers decided against making any substitutions until half-time despite being down to 10 men. Instead, the Northern Irishman employed a 4-3-2 formation with Luis Palma and Kyogo Furuhashi up front for the Bhoys.
The post Former Bhoys defender questions Brendan Rodgers' tactics after red card in 6-0 loss  appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Former Bhoys defender questions Brendan Rodgers' tactics after red card in 6-0 loss

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Liam Scales labelled Celtic ‘naive’ after Tuesday’s 6-0 defeat to Atletico Madrid left the Hoops on the brink of exiting the Champions League.
Celtic currently sit bottom in Group E, having earned just one point after four games. With just two matches remaining, they face an uphill battle for a chance to advance to the knockout stages.
The post Celtic star gets honest after dire mid-week defeat appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Celtic star gets honest after dire mid-week defeat

articles.description:
Matt O'Riley has been left out of the Denmark squad despite receiving a late call-up last month. 
The Celtic midfielder was surprisingly dropped from Kasper Hjulmand's squad yesterday, with Kasper Dolberg, the player O'Riley had previously replaced in the squad, being preferred by Hjulmand instead.
The post The latest on Celtic midfielder Matt O'Riley's Denmark ambitions appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
David Turnbull has been offered a new long-term deal at Celtic with Brendan Rodgers revealing a contract is on the table. 
Turnbull, who joined Celtic in August 2020 from Motherwell for £3 million, has not yet signed a contract extension at Celtic Park. There has been speculation regarding whether he has been offered a new deal.
The post Ball in Celtic star's court on new long-term deal appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Ball in Celtic star's court on new long-term deal

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Callum McGregor labelled last night's 6-0 defeat to Atletico Madrid 'embarrassing'. 
The Celtic captain believes that his teammates must adapt quickly following such a significant defeat.
Celtic suffered their largest defeat in the Champions League since 2017, against Paris Saint-Germain, where the Hoops lost 7-1 at the Parc des Princes.
The post Callum McGregor doesn't hold back with 'embarrassing' assessment of 6-0 Celtic defeat appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
